Plot: This book gives a unique insight into the work Herge had done on the last Tintin book before his death. At the end, Tintin is about to be cast into a living sculpture by a mysterious enemy - one last cliffhanger for the world's best loved journalist. Ages 7+.
Characters: Tintin, Captain Archibald Haddock, Thomson & Thompson, Roberto Rastapopoulos, Snowy, Nestor, Ramo Nash, Bianca Castafiore, Professor Calculus
